column4: Hey all, I am having trouble with my dvd burner.  I wrote a dvd+rw by copying the files to the dvd folder, and then right clicking in the folder and saying write to disc.  Now, the disc will unmount and mount, but not eject.  I have an NEC-3500AG burner.  Can anyone PLEASE help me??!?!?
graft - THANK YOU SO VERY MUCH!!!!
try unmounting it, then use the 'sudo eject' command.
